CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 13, 1953, pg. 1 reads: "The Courier's second annual Home Service air opened Tuesday to a packed house...Held at Ammon Recreation Center..."
TitMainTitle: Crowd gathered in front of Mansfield Cole Agency, Goode Pharmacy, and Braun Baking Company booths in Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Ammon Center (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
